title: Relaxing Escape Amid Nature in a Luxurious Eco-Friendly Resort
description: Escapes Club is taking you to Nepal’s first eco-friendly resort: The Pavilions Himalayas. Dubbed as ‘the loveliest boutique resort in Nepal’ by The Telegraph, this luxurious haven is the perfect place to reconnect with nature, find your inner warrior with yoga classes, and breathe the fresh air of the Himalayas. Your package includes daily breakfast, a three-course lunch and dinner during your stay and return airport transfers from Pokhara Airport.
offer_address: No 25 Ward | Chisapani, Pumdi Bhumdi, Pokhara 33411, Nepal
